title: The Other Side - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/1/21
itunes:title: The Other Side - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/1/21
description:
George Noory and psychic medium John Russell discuss his theories of what happens after you die, whether Heaven or Hell are real, if reincarnation is truly possible and how dead loved ones and even pets communicate with us after they die.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
